definition: tending to give in or surrender or agree, the act of conceding or yielding
details:
adjective
- tending to give in or surrender or agree
= example: tending to give in or surrender or agree
- lacking stiffness and giving way to pressure
= example: lacking stiffness and giving way to pressure
- inclined to yield to argument or influence or control
= example: inclined to yield to argument or influence or control
noun
- the act of conceding or yielding
= synonyms: concession, conceding
- a verbal act of admitting defeat
= synonyms: surrender
